title: Justin Timberlake is going to be opening the Oscars
text:
The Oscars will open in style this year with none other than Justin Timberlake. The ceremony is going to be breaking with tradition to start with Timberlake's performance of his Best Original Song nominee "Can't Stop The Feeling" from Trolls .
I'm told #Oscars will break tradition and open with song nominee performance by Justin Timberlake. Smart move, he's biggest star in room.
â€” Matthew Belloni (@THRMattBelloni) February 26, 2017
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Usually, the Oscars would start with the host in a musical number or sketch of their own kind, or just with their monologue, but we reckon Jimmy Kimmel will be okay with Timberlake taking to the stage. ( At least it's not Matt Damon .)
Timberlake's track is up against "The Empty Chair" from Jim: The James Foley Story , "How Far I'll Go" from Disney's Moana and two tracks from Oscar frontrunner La La Land : "City Of Stars" and "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)."
"City Of Stars" is the current favo rite to take home the award, but will we find out that you really can't stop the feeling tonight?
From: Digital Spy
